Welcome to the United College of Aviation, Science and Management (UCASM). Choosing a college is one of the most important decisions that you will ever make. It is the key that opens the door to a lifetime of opportunities for growth, service and career. And I think UCASM will be the best choice for those who likes to make a technological, wealthy, bright and prestigious career in Aviation industry.
In fact, the Aviation industry is growing domestically and regionally as a pace faster than anticipated, creating a huge vacuum for skilled personnel. United College of Aviation, Science and Management (UCASM) aims to add considerable value to this multifaceted industry by using our extensive resources. Our commitment to producing high-quality leaders is second to none and the industry recognizes our program as one of the finest in the nation. We are confident to our mission to develop motivated students into the finest aviation professionals on the planet.

It is our ambition to ensure quality education in aviation and continue to add new and innovative courses to stay abreast of the continuously evolving requirements of the industry. With access to the committed and highly qualified teachers/ instructors, UCASM will be the college of your choice. We sincerely hope that you will take advantage of this unique facility to enhance your career aspiration

Finally, I hope that you will take pride in our college. Members of our faculty are known for their energy and sophistication, academic achievements, teaching abilities and devotion to duty. Our standards are challenging and we are dedicating to helping you meet those standards. We will judge the success of College by how well you succeed in realizing your potential as a student and also in your professional career.
I invite you to visit our magnificent campus, inspect our state-of-the art facilities, meet and discuss with students and faculty and discover for yourself why so many bright students have made UCASM as their choice.

NURUL AMIN
Chairman, OS City Group, Omar-Sultan Foundation
